description: Beefy hunk, Damien Stone, has had a thing for his hot, buff, green-eyed neighbor, Blaze Burton, for a while now and devises a plan to get his attention. He sends himself to his neighbor in a huge package, in hopes he’ll finally notice him. He definitely gets the attention he’s been longing for when Blaze opens the box to find him naked with his rock hard cock staring back at him! Nothing left to do except to sit back and let Damien do all the work.
title: The Package
